data.representation.discrete.tranform

Class EntropyMDLDiscretizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.discrete.tranform.EntropyMDLDiscretizer

  • public class EntropyMDLDiscretizer
extends java.lang.Object
    A supervised data discretization approach based on entropy.

      • discretize

        public void discretize(int floatOrInt,
              int index)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs a discretization of the specified feature into an automatically determined number of buckets.
        Parameters:
        floatOrInt - Integer that is 0 if the target feature is integer and 1 if the target feature is float.
        index - Index of the feature in the respective feature array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • discretizeBinary

        public void discretizeBinary(int floatOrInt,
                    int index)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs a discretization of the specified feature into two buckets.
        Parameters:
        floatOrInt - Integer that is 0 if the target feature is integer and 1 if the target feature is float.
        index - Index of the feature in the respective feature array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • discretizeInternalBinary

        public void discretizeInternalBinary(int[] categories,
                            int beginIndex,
                            int endIndex,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> splitPoints)
        A recursive call for performing discretization that keeps track of all previously found split points in the list that is passed on.
        Parameters:
        categories - Category array.
        beginIndex - Lower index.
        endIndex - Upper index.
        splitPoints - ArrayList of integer indexes of current split points.
